name: Sample Capability Statement for configuration of onFHIR.io
description: This is a sample Capability Statement to demonstrate how you can configure onFHIR.io and setup a FHIR server that meet your requirements...

software.name: onFHIR.io Secure FHIR Repository Sample Server

security.description: This is the Capability Statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server

interaction.documentation: Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)
Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)
Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)
Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A patient identifier

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: The patient's date of birth

searchParam.name: deceased
searchParam.documentation: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the patient

searchParam.name: general-practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

searchParam.name: link
searchParam.documentation: All patients linked to the given patient

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Whether the patient record is active

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: address-use
searchParam.documentation: A use code specified in an address

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: ethnicity
searchParam.documentation: Ethnicity of patient

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: combo-data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] or Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about

searchParam.name: component-data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: value-date
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

searchParam.name: focus
searchParam.documentation: The focus of an observation when the focus is not the patient of record.

searchParam.name: derived-from
searchParam.documentation: Related measurements the observation is made from

searchParam.name: part-of
searchParam.documentation: Part of referenced event

searchParam.name: has-member
searchParam.documentation: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group

searchParam.name: code-value-string
searchParam.documentation: Code and string value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: based-on
searchParam.documentation: Reference to the service request.

searchParam.name: code-value-date
searchParam.documentation: Code and date/time value parameter pair

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: Specimen used for this observation

searchParam.name: component-code
searchParam.documentation: The component code of the observation type

searchParam.name: code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: value-string
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a string, and also searches in CodeableConcept.text

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique id for a particular observation

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who performed the observation

searchParam.name: combo-code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type or component type

searchParam.name: method
searchParam.documentation: The method used for the observation

searchParam.name: value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: component-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: combo-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter related to the observation

searchParam.name: code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: device
searchParam.documentation: The Device that generated the observation data.

searchParam.name: combo-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the observation

interaction.documentation: Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)
Implemented per the specification (or Insert other doco here)

searchParam.name: _text
searchParam.documentation: Search on the narrative of the resource

searchParam.name: _list
searchParam.documentation: Retrieval of resources that are referenced by a List resource

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Provides support for reverse chaining

searchParam.name: _type
searchParam.documentation: Type of resource (when doing cross-resource search

searchParam.name: _sort
searchParam.documentation: How to sort the resources when returning

searchParam.name: _count
searchParam.documentation: How many resources to return

searchParam.name: _include
searchParam.documentation: Control over returning additional resources (see spec)

searchParam.name: _revinclude
searchParam.documentation: Control over returning additional resources (see spec)

searchParam.name: _summary
searchParam.documentation: What kind of information to return

searchParam.name: _elements
searchParam.documentation: What kind of information to return

searchParam.name: _profile
searchParam.documentation: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: When the resource version last changed

searchParam.name: _tag
searchParam.documentation: Tags applied to this resource

searchParam.name: _security
searchParam.documentation: Security Labels applied to this resource

searchParam.name: _source
searchParam.documentation: Identifies where the resource comes from

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: Logical id of this artifact
